name: PoliovirusInfectionTestsForPoliovirusAntibodyTiterInSerumSpecimen
title: Poliovirus Infection (Tests for Poliovirus Antibody Titer in Serum Specimen)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for lab test names to detect Polio virus IgG antibody),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query = Polio virus Ab Titer, serum),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
